Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased kinase activity observed in G2019S-expressing cells compared to wild-type.
R1441C variant exhibited elevated kinase activity in HEK293 cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across three independent biological preparations.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 20% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: LRRK2 variants were expressed in SH-SY5Y cells for kinase activity measurements.

Readout description.Result Description: G2019S variant demonstrated 40% increased kinase activity compared to wild-type in SH-SY5Y cells.
R1441C variant showed 30% higher kinase activity in SH-SY5Y cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across three independent biological preparations.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Unpaired t-test with multiple comparisons correction.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 15% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 25% of wild-type levels.
